item.title: China says it 'drove away' U.S. warship near the disputed Scarborough Shoal
item.description: This comes after a Chinese warship crashed into one of its own country's coast guard vessels as it chased a patrol boat belonging to the Philippines

item.title: White House eyes Smithsonian museums for Trump's 'American exceptionalism' compliance
item.description: The Smithsonian museums will get four months to make "content corrections" if exhibits don't match a directive by President Trump.
